Issue.creator: suryalnvs
Issue.summary: Test scenario: Upgrade all orderers(kafka), upgrade 2 peers out of 4, and send invokes before and after config update to enable new capabilities (from 1.0.x to 1.1). Two peers (v1.0) panic at last step. After upgrading those 2 peers, they recover.
Issue.description: {color:#000000}Upgrade all orderers(kafka), upgrade 2 peers out of 4, and send invokes before and after config update to enable new capabilities (from 1.0.x to 1.1). Two peers (v1.0) panic at last step.{color}
